TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lived , before his arrest , in the town of PERSON in ORG . He is serving a prison sentence of DATE having been convicted of several counts of aggravated robbery and theft committed within an organised criminal group .

CARDINAL in PERSON . TIME an officer on duty , PERSON , drew up an administrative offence record which , in its relevant part , read as follows :
